text:
Drinks with reasonable priced and the staff are very friendly, especially QIQI, CHERISH & JIARONG. The KTV system is up-to-date with the latest songs and has an excellent sound system, so you can really enjoy your karaoke sessions. While you might have to wait a little if itâ€™s full house, the pool table is just $2 per game.

Thereâ€™s plenty of parking right outside the pub.
Highly recommend! :)

Best part to be the TEAM, with Eileen, Cherish, Qiqi and Rong who whom make us feel home. Good place and system for your drinking and singing kakis!
I like the ambient... service is excellence. Especially both the staff are friendly and interactive. Ms Cherish has a cheerful smile and is very helpful.

The staff here is very friendly and keep
Us all happy. They are always at the service when even needed, especially Qiqi and Jiarong. The so helpful and entertaining. For sure I will be here again.
